```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
library(readxl)
library(tidyverse)
library(Biostatistics)
```

#fixing dataframe
```{r}
depth <- read_xlsx('MC_WaterDepth_Olivia.xlsx') %>% na.omit()
depth$Date <- format(as.Date(depth$`Date/Time`), "%m/%Y")

#getting it to group by month and then average it out!
average <- aggregate(Depth ~ Date, depth, FUN = mean)

#going to just make it an excel sheet since I have it in an easier format now
#write_xlsx(average, 'Water_Depth.xlsx')
```

#graphs
```{r}
depth %>% ggplot() + geom_point(aes(x = `Date/Time` , y = Depth)) + theme(axis.text.x = element_text(size = 7, angle = 45), axis.ticks = element_blank())

depth %>% ggplot() + geom_point(aes(x = Date , y = Depth)) + theme(axis.text.x = element_text(size = 7, angle = 45), axis.ticks = element_blank())

average %>% ggplot() + geom_point(aes(x = Date, y = Depth)) + theme(axis.text.x = element_text(size = 7, angle = 45), axis.ticks = element_blank()) + scale_x_discrete(limits = c('01/2017', '02/2017', '03/2017', '04/2017', '05/2017', '06/2017', '07/2017', '08/2017', '09/2017', '10/2017', '11/2017', '12/2017', '01/2018', '02/2018', '03/2018', '04/2018', '05/2018', '06/2018', '07/2018', '08/2018', '09/2018', '10/2018', '11/2018', '12/2018', '01/2019', '02/2019', '03/2019', '04/2019', '05/2019', '06/2019', '07/2019', '08/2019', '09/2019', '10/2019', '11/2019', '12/2019', '01/2020', '02/2020', '03/2020', '04/2020', '05/2020', '06/2020', '07/2020', '08/2020', '09/2020', '10/2020', '11/2020', '12/2020'))
#all over the place
```

#making season graphs
```{r}
average %>% ggplot() + geom_boxplot(aes(x = Season, y = Depth))
season.aov <- aov(Depth ~ Season, average)
summary(season.aov)
TukeyHSD(season.aov)
#Winter is lower than all other seasons- very significant
```
